faq.question: What services do you offer?
faq.answer: We provide emergency roadside repairs and assistance (any type of repair, towing, battery jump-starts, flat tire repair) where a mechanic comes to your location and does the repair. We also provide on-demand vehicle repair services. Our services include general vehicle repairs (engine diagnostics, brake repair, oil changes), and garage engineering services (lathe work, boring, welding, and more).

faq.question: How does Baato Mechanic work?
faq.answer: You can request a mechanic through our mobile app, and a skilled professional will be dispatched to your location. You will receive an upfront cost estimate before starting the request.

faq.question: Do you provide emergency roadside assistance?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer 24/7 roadside assistance, including towing, battery jump-starts, flat tire replacement, fuel delivery, and more.

faq.question: How can I book a mechanic?
faq.answer: You can book a mechanic through our Baato Mechanic app, via our website, google playstore or by calling our customer support.(+977 9868957429)

faq.question: Will I know the cost before the repair?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide a transparent price estimate  before starting the repair. If the mechanic needs to inspect the vehicle first, they will provide a final cost before proceeding with the repair.

faq.question: What is Baato Kharcha (traveling charge)?
faq.answer: If a mechanic is dispatched to your location and you cancel or decline the service upon arrival, you must pay a Baato Kharcha (travelling charge). This amount is determined before the mechanic departs, ensuring fairness for both parties.

faq.question: Do you use original manufacturer parts?
faq.answer: We use both OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) and high-quality aftermarket parts, depending on customer preference and availability.

faq.question: How long does a repair take?
faq.answer: The repair time varies. Minor repairs can be completed within a few hours, while major repairs may take a day or more. For engineering services, some work is done on-site, while others may require pick-up and drop.

terms_and_conditions.title: Introduction
content: Welcome to Baato Mechanic! These Terms and Conditions ('Terms') govern your use of our mobile application and services. By using Baato Mechanic, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

content.title: Platform
content.content: Refers to Baato Mechanic, including the mobile application and any associated services.

content.title: Consumer
content.content: A user requesting vehicle repair or engineering services.

content.title: Mechanic
content.content: A professional providing vehicle repair services.

content.title: Engineer
content.content: A professional providing engineering services such as lathe work and boring.

content.title: On-Road Vehicle Repair
content.content: Consumers can request a mechanic to come to a specified location and repair their vehicle.

content.title: Engineering Services
content.content: Consumers can request services like lathe work, boring, and other garage-related engineering work. The engineer may either visit the consumer, pick up the item for repair, or require the consumer to drop the item at the workshop.

content.title: Consumer Responsibilities
content: Provide accurate location details when requesting a service. Ensure vehicle safety while waiting for the mechanic. Inspect and confirm the completion of service before accepting the repair. Pay the agreed service fee in cash.

content.title: Mechanic and Engineer Responsibilities
content: Provide professional and reliable services. Arrive at the location in a timely manner after accepting a service request. Clearly communicate the service scope, estimated costs, and required parts before proceeding. Ensure proper handling and repair of vehicles or engineering items.

terms_and_conditions.title: Liability and Disputes
content: The mechanic is responsible for the repair while it is in progress. Once the repair is completed and accepted by the user, Baato Mechanic is not responsible for any subsequent issues. Any disputes regarding the service must be resolved directly between the user and the mechanic. Baato Mechanic may assist in mediation but holds no liability.

terms_and_conditions.title: Mechanic and Engineer Verification
content: All mechanics and engineers registered on Baato Mechanic undergo ID verification and background checks. However, Baato Mechanic does not guarantee the quality of services provided.

terms_and_conditions.title: Payments and Cancellation Policy
content: As of now, only cash payments are supported. Wallet and online payment options will be introduced in the future. If a user cancels a service request after the mechanic is en route or has arrived, the user must pay for the mechanic’s travel expenses.

terms_and_conditions.title: Insurance and Guarantees
content: Baato Mechanic currently does not provide any insurance or guarantees for repairs. Future updates may include repair warranties.

terms_and_conditions.title: Data Protection and Privacy
terms_and_conditions.content: Your personal information is protected as outlined in our Privacy Policy.

terms_and_conditions.title: Modifications to Terms
terms_and_conditions.content: Baato Mechanic reserves the right to update these Terms at any time. Continued use of the platform after modifications constitutes agreement to the new Terms.

privacy_policy.title: Introduction
privacy_policy.content: This Privacy Policy explains how Baato Mechanic collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our platform.

privacy_policy.title: Information We Collect
privacy_policy.content: We collect personal information based on whether you are a consumer or a mechanic/engineer. For consumers, we collect the following: Name, Phone number, Email, Vehicle number. For mechanics and engineers, we collect: Name, Phone number, Email, ID verification details, Background check information.

privacy_policy.title: How We Use Your Data
privacy_policy.content: We use your data to facilitate connections between users and mechanics/engineers, improve our platform and services, process transactions and customer support requests, and ensure security and fraud prevention.

privacy_policy.title: Data Sharing
privacy_policy.content: We do not sell, rent, or trade your data. We share it with mechanics and engineers to complete service requests, with law enforcement if required by law, and with third-party service providers for analytics and app functionality.

privacy_policy.title: Data Security
privacy_policy.content: We implement security measures to protect your personal data. However, no online platform is completely secure, so users should take precautions when sharing sensitive information.

privacy_policy.title: Retention of Data
privacy_policy.content: We retain personal data as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.

privacy_policy.title: Your Rights
privacy_policy.content: You have the right to request access to your personal data, request correction or deletion of your data, and opt out of marketing communications.

privacy_policy.title: Changes to Policy
privacy_policy.content: Baato Mechanic may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Users will be notified of significant changes.
